TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Information extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含了傳回、測試或驗證資訊所用的程序。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to return, test for, or verify information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員所提供的錯誤資訊、 驗證資料、 判斷陣列界限和擷取的資料類型及色彩資訊。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that provide error information, validate data, determine array bounds, and retrieve data type and color information. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`VbTypeName`函式傳回多個變數的資料型別名稱。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. ```vb Dim sysDateName As String = "System.DateTime" Dim sysShortName As String = "Int16" Dim sysBadName As String = "Nonsense" Dim testVbName As String testVbName = VbTypeName(sysDateName) ' Returns "Date". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysShortName) ' Returns "Short". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysBadName) ' Returns Nothing. ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 Erl() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回整數，指出最後執行之陳述式的行數。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.
Read-only.

returns.span: 傳回整數，指出最後執行之陳述式的行數。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

returns.span: 唯讀。

span.span: Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Visual Basic 遇到沒有行號，則會傳回 0。If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Erl`屬性，可指出的行號。This example uses the `Erl` property to indicate the line number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static class Microsoft.VisualBasic.ErrObject Err() cil managed

summary.span: 包含執行階段錯誤的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about run-time errors.

returns.span: 包含執行階段錯誤的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about run-time errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性`Err`物件設定錯誤的產生器-Visual Basic、 物件或程式設計人員。The properties of the `Err` object are set by the generator of an error—Visual Basic, an object, or the programmer. 執行階段發生錯誤時，屬性`Err`物件會填入唯一識別錯誤的資訊，並可供您處理錯誤。When a run-time error occurs, the properties of the `Err` object are filled with information that uniquely identifies the error and that you can use to handle the error. 若要在程式碼中產生執行階段錯誤，請使用`Raise`方法。To generate a run-time error in your code, use the `Raise` method. `Err`物件的屬性會重設為零或零長度字串 ("") 之後`Exit Sub`， `Exit Function`， `Exit Property`，或`Resume Next`錯誤處理常式內的陳述式。The `Err` object's properties are reset to zero or zero-length strings ("") after an `Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, `Exit Property`, or `Resume Next` statement within an error-handling routine. 使用任何形式的`Resume`之外的錯誤處理常式的陳述式不會重設`Err`物件的屬性。Using any form of the `Resume` statement outside of an error-handling routine will not reset the `Err` object's properties. 您可以使用`Clear`方法來明確地重設`Err`。You can use the `Clear` method to explicitly reset `Err`. 使用`Raise`方法而非`Error`陳述式來產生執行階段錯誤，系統錯誤，並在類別模組。Use the `Raise` method rather than the `Error` statement to generate run-time errors for system errors and class modules. 您決定是否要使用`Raise`其他程式碼中的方法取決於您想要傳回的資訊的豐富功能。Your decision about whether to use the `Raise` method in other code depends on the richness of the information you want to return. `Err`物件是具有全域領域的內建函式物件。The `Err` object is an intrinsic object with global scope. 因此，您不需要程式碼中建立它的執行個體。Therefore, you do not need to create an instance of it in your code. ## Examples 此範例使用的屬性`Err`建構錯誤訊息對話方塊中的物件。This example uses the properties of the `Err` object in constructing an error-message dialog box. 請注意，如果您使用`Clear`方法時產生與 Visual Basic 錯誤的先`Raise`方法，而 Visual Basic 的預設值會變成屬性`Err`物件。Notice that if you use the `Clear` method first, when you generate a Visual Basic error with the `Raise` method, Visual Basic's default values become the properties of the `Err` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsArray(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function IsArray (VarName As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
variable.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出變數是否指向陣列。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出變數是否指向陣列。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsArray` 會傳回`True`變數指向的陣列中; 否則它會傳回`False`。`IsArray` returns `True` if the variable points to an array; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsArray` 會使用物件，其中可能包含陣列特別有用。`IsArray` is especially useful with objects that might contain arrays. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`IsArray`檢查幾個變數如果參考陣列的函式。This example uses the `IsArray` function to check if several variables refer to an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#34)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDate(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDate (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否表示有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否表示有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDate` 會傳回`True`如果`Expression`屬於資料類型，或可以轉換成它; 否則它會傳回`False`。`IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` is of the data type or can be converted to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. 資料類型會保留日期值和時間值。The data type holds both a date value and a time value. `IsDate` 會傳回`True`如果`Expression`代表有效的日期、 有效的時間，或有效的日期和時間。`IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a valid date, a valid time, or a valid date and time. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`IsDate`函式來判斷是否數個變數代表有效值。The following example uses the `IsDate` function to determine if several variables represent valid values. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#35)] 在上述範例中，`IsDate`會傳回`True`前四個呼叫和`False`的最後一次呼叫。In the preceding example, `IsDate` returns `True` for the first four calls and `False` for the last call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDBNull(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDBNull (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否會計算結果為 類別。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否會計算結果為 類別。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDBNull` 會傳回`True`資料類型，是否`Expression`評估為類型; 否則`IsDBNull`傳回`False`。`IsDBNull` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` evaluates to the type; otherwise, `IsDBNull` returns `False`. 值，指出`Object`表示遺失或不存在的資料。The value indicates that the `Object` represents missing or nonexistent data. `DBNull` 不與相同`Nothing`，這表示尚未初始化的變數。`DBNull` is not the same as `Nothing`, which indicates that a variable has not yet been initialized. `DBNull` 也不是零長度字串相同 (`""`)，這有時稱為 null 字串。`DBNull` is also not the same as a zero-length string (`""`), which is sometimes referred to as a null string. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`IsDBNull`函式來判斷變數是否評估為`DBNull`。This example uses the `IsDBNull` function to determine if a variable evaluates to `DBNull`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsError(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsError (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否為例外狀況類型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否為例外狀況類型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsError` 會傳回`True`如果運算式代表`Object`變數，會衍生自類別在命名空間。`IsError` returns `True` if the expression represents an `Object` variable that derives from the class in the namespace. 例外狀況衍生自可攔截與`Try...Catch...Finally`陳述式。An exception that derives from can be caught with the `Try...Catch...Finally` statements. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`IsError`函式來檢查運算式是否代表系統例外狀況。The following example uses the `IsError` function to check if an expression represents a system exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNothing(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNothing (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出是否沒有將任何物件指派給運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出是否沒有將任何物件指派給運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNothing` 會傳回`True`如果運算式代表目前不含任何物件指派給它，否則為物件變數，它會傳回`False`。`IsNothing` returns `True` if the expression represents an object variable that currently has no object assigned to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsNothing` 被要在參考類型上運作。`IsNothing` is intended to work on reference types. 實值型別不能保存的值，並還原為其預設值，如果您指派`Nothing`給它。A value type cannot hold a value of and reverts to its default value if you assign `Nothing` to it. 如果您提供在中的實值型別`Expression`，`IsNothing`一律會傳回`False`。If you supply a value type in `Expression`, `IsNothing` always returns `False`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`IsNothing`函式來判斷是否與任何物件執行個體相關聯的物件變數。The following example uses the `IsNothing` function to determine if an object variable is associated with any object instance. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNumeric(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNumeric (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否可以評估為數字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否可以評估為數字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNumeric` 會傳回`True`資料類型，是否`Expression`是`Boolean`， `Byte`， `Decimal`， `Double`， `Integer`， `Long`， `SByte`， `Short`， `Single`， `UInteger`，`ULong`，或`UShort`。`IsNumeric` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` is `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Decimal`, `Double`, `Integer`, `Long`, `SByte`, `Short`, `Single`, `UInteger`, `ULong`, or `UShort`. 它也會傳回`True`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`，可以成功轉換的數字。It also returns `True` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that can be successfully converted to a number. `Expression` 可以包含非數字字元。`Expression` can contain non-numeric characters. `IsNumeric` 會傳回`True`如果`Expression`是包含有效的十六進位或八進位表示數字的字串。`IsNumeric` returns `True` if `Expression` is a string that contains a valid hexadecimal or octal number. `IsNumeric` 也會傳回`True`如果`Expression`包含有效的數值運算式以 + 或-字元或包含逗號。`IsNumeric` also returns `True` if `Expression` contains a valid numeric expression that begins with a + or - character or contains commas. `IsNumeric` 會傳回`False`如果`Expression`資料類型`Date`。`IsNumeric` returns `False` if `Expression` is of data type `Date`. 它會傳回`False`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`，無法成功轉換成數字。It returns `False` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that cannot be successfully converted to a number. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`IsNumeric`函式來判斷是否變數的內容可以評估為數字。The following example uses the `IsNumeric` function to determine if the contents of a variable can be evaluated as a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsReference(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsReference (Expression As Object) As Boolean

span.span: Required.
expression.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否會計算結果為參考類型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出運算式是否會計算結果為參考類型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsReference` 會傳回`True`如果`Expression`表示參考類型，例如類別執行個體`String`型別或任何類型; 的陣列，否則會傳回`False`。`IsReference` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a reference type, such as a class instance, a `String` type, or an array of any type; otherwise, it returns `False`. 參考型別包含資料儲存在記憶體中的其他位置的指標。A reference type contains a pointer to data stored elsewhere in memory. 實值型別包含它自己的資料。A value type contains its own data. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`IsReference`函式來檢查是否數個變數指向參考型別。This example uses the `IsReference` function to check if several variables refer to reference types. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#40)] 在上述範例中前, 三個呼叫來`IsReference`傳回`True`。In the preceding example, the first three calls to `IsReference` return `True`. 最後一次呼叫會傳回`False`，因為`Integer`是實值類型，而不是參考型別。The last call returns `False`, because `Integer` is a value type, not a reference type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int LBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);
.method public static int32 LBound(class System.Array Array, int32 Rank) cil managed
static member LBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array

span.span: Required.
Array of any data type.

param.span: 您想在該陣列中找到維度的最低可能註標。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the lowest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 針對可能的最低註標，所要傳回的維度。

span.span: The dimension for which the lowest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 使用 1 表示第一個維度，2 表示第二個維度，依此類推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

param.span: 如果省略了 Rank，則假設為 1。

span.span: If Rank is omitted, 1 is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回所指示的陣列維度之可用的最低註標 (Subscript)。

span.span: Returns the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定之維度的註標可以包含的最低值。

span.span: The lowest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 只要 已經完成初始化， 一定會傳回 0，即使它沒有任何項目也是如此，例如，如果它是長度為零的字串。

span.span: always returns 0 as long as has been initialized, even if it has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string.

returns.span: 如果 為 ，則 會擲回 。

span.span: If is , throws an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於陣列註標起始為 0，每個維度的最低可用註標永遠為 0。Since array subscripts start at 0, the lowest available subscript for every dimension is always 0. 與下列維度中，陣列`LBound`傳回下表中的值：For an array with the following dimensions, `LBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |LBound 呼叫Call to LBound|傳回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`LBound(a, 1)`|00| |`LBound(a, 2)`|00| |`LBound(a, 3)`|00| ## Examples 下列範例會使用`LBound`函式來判斷指定的陣列維度之最低可用註標。The following example uses the `LBound` function to determine the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 小於 1 或 大於 的陣序規範。

span.span: less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 QBColor(int32 Color) cil managed
Public Function QBColor (Color As Integer) As Integer

param.name: Color

span.span: Required.

param.span: 介於 0–15 範圍之間的整數。

span.span: A whole number in the range 0–15.

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示對應到指定之色彩編號的 RGB 色彩代碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

returns.span: 傳回 值，表示對應到指定之色彩編號的 RGB 色彩代碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從最小顯著性位元組開始，傳回的值，指定用來設定適當的色彩，RGB 系統使用的 Visual Basic 語言中的紅色、 綠色和藍色值。Starting with the least-significant byte, the returned value specifies the red, green, and blue values used to set the appropriate color in the RGB system used by the Visual Basic language. `Color`引數具有這些設定。The `Color` argument has these settings. |數字Number|色彩Color|numberNumber|色彩Color| |------------|-----------|------------|-----------| |00|黑色Black|88|灰色Gray| |11|藍色Blue|99|淺藍色Light blue| |22|綠色Green|1010|淺綠色Light green| |33|青色Cyan|1111|淺青綠Light cyan| |44|紅色Red|1212|淡紅色Light red| |55|洋紅色Magenta|1313|淺洋紅色Light magenta| |66|黃色Yellow|1414|淺黃色Light yellow| |77|白皮書White|1515|亮白色Bright white| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`QBColor`所指定的函式來變更色彩`colorInteger`。This example uses the `QBColor` function to change to the color indicated by `colorInteger`. `QBColor` 接受介於 0 到 15 之間的整數值。`QBColor` accepts integer values between 0 and 15. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

exception.span: 超出 0 到 15 的範圍 (含 0 和 15)。

span.span: is outside of range 0 to 15, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int RGB (int Red, int Green, int Blue);
.method public static int32 RGB(int32 Red, int32 Green, int32 Blue) cil managed
Public Function RGB (Red As Integer, Green As Integer, Blue As Integer) As Integer
public: static int RGB(int Red, int Green, int Blue);
static member RGB : int * int * int -> int

param.name: Red

span.span: Required.

param.span: 在 0–255 範圍 (包含頭尾) 中的 ，表示色彩中紅色元件的濃度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the red component of the color.

param.name: Green

span.span: Required.

param.span: 在 0–255 範圍 (包含頭尾) 中的 ，表示色彩中綠色元件的濃度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the green component of the color.

param.name: Blue

span.span: Required.

param.span: 在 0–255 範圍 (包含頭尾) 中的 ，表示色彩中藍色元件的濃度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the blue component of the color.

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示一組紅色、綠色和藍色元件中的 RGB 色彩值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

returns.span: 傳回 值，表示一組紅色、綠色和藍色元件中的 RGB 色彩值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的方法和屬性接受的色彩規格，預期規格是數字表示的 RGB 色彩值。Application methods and properties that accept a color specification expect that specification to be a number representing an RGB color value. RGB 色彩值會指定相對的紅色、 綠色和藍色顯示的色彩濃度。An RGB color value specifies the relative intensity of red, green, and blue to cause a specific color to be displayed. 如果任何引數的值`RGB`大於 255，則使用 255。If the value for any argument to `RGB` is greater than 255, 255 is used. 下表列出一些標準的色彩及其包含的紅色、 綠色和藍色值。The following table lists some standard colors and the red, green, and blue values they include. |色彩Color|紅色值Red value|環保價值Green value|藍色的值Blue value| |-----------|---------------|-----------------|----------------| |黑色Black|00|00|00| |藍色Blue|00|00|255255| |綠色Green|00|255255|00| |青色Cyan|00|255255|255255| |紅色Red|255255|00|00| |洋紅色Magenta|255255|00|255255| |黃色Yellow|255255|255255|00| |白皮書White|255255|255255|255255| ## Examples 此範例示範如何`RGB`函式用來傳回整數，代表`RGB`色彩值。This example shows how the `RGB` function is used to return a whole number representing an `RGB` color value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

exception.span: 、 或 超出 0 到 225 的範圍 (含 0 和 225)。

span.span: , , or is outside of range 0 to 255, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string SystemTypeName(string VbName) cil managed
Public Function SystemTypeName (VbName As String) As String

param.name: VbName

span.span: Required.

param.span: 變數，包含 Visual Basic 類型名稱。

span.span: A variable containing a Visual Basic type name.

summary.span: 傳回 值，其中包含某個變數的系統資料類型名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 傳回 值，其中包含某個變數的系統資料類型名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SystemTypeName` 傳回完整 common language runtime (CLR) 型別名稱對應至 Visual Basic 類型名稱。`SystemTypeName` returns the fully qualified common language runtime (CLR) type name corresponding to the Visual Basic type name. 例如，如果`VbName`包含 「 日期 」，`SystemTypeName`傳回"System.DateTime"。For example, if `VbName` contains "Date", `SystemTypeName` returns "System.DateTime". 如果`SystemTypeName`無法辨識的值`VbName`，它會傳回`Nothing`(不是字串"Nothing")。If `SystemTypeName` does not recognize the value of `VbName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). ## Examples 下列範例會使用`SystemTypeName`函式傳回多個變數的資料型別名稱。The following example uses the `SystemTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#49)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string TypeName(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function TypeName (VarName As Object) As String

param.name: VarName

span.span: Required.
variable.

param.span: 如果 為 ，您可以傳遞任何資料型別的變數，但是結構除外。

span.span: If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.

summary.span: 傳回 值，其中包含與變數有關的資料類型資訊。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

returns.span: 傳回 值，其中包含與變數有關的資料類型資訊。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示`String`所傳回的值`TypeName`當作不同內容`VarName`。The following table shows the `String` values returned by `TypeName` for different contents of `VarName`. |`VarName` 內容`VarName` contents|傳回的字串String returned| |------------------------|---------------------| |16 位元`True`或`False`實值型別16-bit `True` or `False` value type|"Boolean""Boolean"| |8 位元二進位實值型別8-bit binary value type|「 位元組 」"Byte"| |16 位元字元實值型別16-bit character value type|"Char""Char"| |64 位元的日期和時間值類型64-bit date and time value type|「 日期 」"Date"| |表示資料遺失或不存在的參考型別Reference type indicating missing or nonexistent data|"DBNull""DBNull"| |128 位元定點的實值型別128-bit fixed-point numeric value type|[十進位]"Decimal"| |64 位元浮點數的實值型別64-bit floating-point numeric value type|"Double""Double"| |32 位元整數實值型別32-bit integer value type|"Integer""Integer"| |指向特製化的物件參考型別Reference type pointing to an unspecialized object|「 物件 」"Object"| |指向 從類別建立的特定物件的參考型別*objectclass*Reference type pointing to a specialized object created from class *objectclass*|「*objectclass*""*objectclass*"| |64 位元整數實值型別64-bit integer value type|"Long""Long"| |與目前已指派給它的任何物件的參考型別Reference type with no object currently assigned to it|"Nothing""Nothing"| |8 位元帶正負號的整數值的型別8-bit signed integer value type|「 SByte""SByte"| |16 位元整數實值型別16-bit integer value type|"Short""Short"| |32 位元浮點數的實值型別32-bit floating-point numeric value type|「 單一 」"Single"| |16 位元的字元字串所指向的參考型別Reference type pointing to a string of 16-bit characters|「 字串 」"String"| |32 位元不帶正負號的整數值型別32-bit unsigned integer value type|「 UInteger""UInteger"| |64 位元不帶正負號的整數值型別64-bit unsigned integer value type|「 ULong""ULong"| |16 位元不帶正負號的整數值型別16-bit unsigned integer value type|「 UShort""UShort"| 如果`VarName`是陣列，傳回的字串可以是其中一個以附加空括號上表中的字串。If `VarName` is an array, the returned string can be any one of the strings in the preceding table with empty parentheses appended. 例如，如果`VarName`指向整數的陣列、`TypeName`傳回 「 Integer()"。For example, if `VarName` points to an array of integers, `TypeName` returns "Integer()". 當`TypeName`傳回參考類型的名稱等類別，它會傳回只有名稱本身，而不是限定名稱。When `TypeName` returns the name of a reference type such as a class, it returns only the name itself, not the qualified name. 例如，如果`VarName`指向類別的物件，`TypeName`傳回 「 PaperSource"。For example, if `VarName` points to an object of class , `TypeName` returns "PaperSource". 請注意，如果宣告為特定類別類型的變數，但卻沒有物件指派給它，`TypeName`傳回"Nothing"。Note that if the variable is declared to be of a certain class type but does not have an object assigned to it, `TypeName` returns "Nothing". ## Examples 下列範例會使用`TypeName`函式來傳回幾個變數的資料型別資訊。The following example uses the `TypeName` function to return data type information about several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int UBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);
.method public static int32 UBound(class System.Array Array, int32 Rank) cil managed
static member UBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array

span.span: Required.
Array of any data type.

param.span: 您想在該陣列中找到維度的最高可能註標。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the highest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 針對可能的最高註標，所要傳回的維度。

span.span: The dimension for which the highest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 使用 1 表示第一個維度，2 表示第二個維度，依此類推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

param.span: 如果省略了 Rank，則假設為 1。

span.span: If Rank is omitted, 1 is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回所指示的陣列維度之可用的最高註標。

span.span: Returns the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定之維度的註標可以包含的最高值。

span.span: The highest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 如果 只有一個元素，則 會傳回 0。

span.span: If has only one element, returns 0.

returns.span: 如果 沒有任何項目，例如它是零長度字串，則 會傳回 -1。

span.span: If has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於陣列註標起始為 0，就有一個維度的長度大於一比該維度的最大可用註標。Since array subscripts start at 0, the length of a dimension is greater by one than the highest available subscript for that dimension. 與下列維度中，陣列`UBound`傳回下表中的值：For an array with the following dimensions, `UBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |呼叫 UBoundCall to UBound|傳回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`UBound(a, 1)`|100100| |`UBound(a, 2)`|55| |`UBound(a, 3)`|44| 您可以使用`UBound`判斷總計的項目數的陣列，但是您必須調整其傳回至註標起始為 0 的事實的值。You can use `UBound` to determine the total number of elements in an array, but you must adjust the value it returns to account for the fact that the subscripts start at 0. 下列範例會計算陣列的大小總計`a`在上述範例中：The following example calculates the total size of the array `a` in the preceding example: ```vb Dim total As Integer total = (UBound(A, 1) + 1) * (UBound(A, 2) + 1) * (UBound(A, 3) + 1) ``` 計算值`total`為 3030，也就是 101 * 6 * 5。The value calculated for `total` is 3030, which is 101 * 6 * 5. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`UBound`函式來判斷所指定維度的陣列的最大可用註標。The following example uses the `UBound` function to determine the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 小於 1 或 大於 的陣序規範。

span.span: is less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的整數值`VarType`隸屬。The integer value returned by `VarType` is a member of the . 下表顯示所傳回的值`VarType`的特殊案例`VarName`。The following table shows the values returned by `VarType` for special cases of `VarName`. |所表示的資料類型 `VarName`Data type represented by `VarName`|所傳回的值 `VarType`Value returned by `VarType`| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |[NothingNothing](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)|`VariantType.Object`| ||`VariantType.Null`| |列舉Enumeration|基礎資料類型 (`SByte`， `Byte`， `Short`， `UShort`， `Integer`， `UInteger`， `Long`，或`ULong`)Underlying data type (`SByte`, `Byte`, `Short`, `UShort`, `Integer`, `UInteger`, `Long`, or `ULong`)| |陣列Array|陣列項目類型的位元 OR 與 `VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of array element type and `VariantType.Array`| |陣列的陣列Array of arrays|位元 OR`VariantType.Object`和 `VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of `VariantType.Object` and `VariantType.Array`| |結構 ()Structure ()|`VariantType.UserDefinedType`| ||`VariantType.Error`| |不明Unknown|`VariantType.Object`| ## Examples 下列範例會使用`VarType`函數來傳回有關數個變數的資料型別分類資訊。The following example uses the `VarType` function to return data type classification information about several variables. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string VbTypeName(string UrtName) cil managed
Public Function VbTypeName (UrtName As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: UrtName

span.span: Required.

param.span: 變數，包含 Common Language Runtime 所用的類型名稱。

span.span: variable containing a type name used by the common language runtime.

summary.span: 傳回 值，其中包含某個變數的 Visual Basic 資料類型名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 傳回 值，其中包含某個變數的 Visual Basic 資料類型名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `VbTypeName` 傳回對應至 common language runtime 型別名稱的 Visual Basic 型別名稱。`VbTypeName` returns the Visual Basic type name corresponding to the common language runtime type name. 例如，如果`UrtName`包含"Int32"或"System.Int32"，`VbTypeName`傳回"Integer"。For example, if `UrtName` contains "Int32" or "System.Int32", `VbTypeName` returns "Integer". 如果`VbTypeName`無法辨識的值`UrtName`，它會傳回`Nothing`(不是字串"Nothing")。If `VbTypeName` does not recognize the value of `UrtName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). 中的類型名稱`UrtName`可以從各種來源，例如取得中的屬性陣列類別。The type name in `UrtName` can be obtained from various sources, for example from the property in the array of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`VbTypeName`函式傳回多個變數的資料型別名稱。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#56)]
